file_content.text: I wait here.
The poison... my chest.
Please. To the Shrine of Healing.
You return. To continue my pilgrimage?
I go to Novices' Hall at the Shrine of Healing. The healers will be honored to teach me.
First, a marker on the pilgrimage path. I pay homage to Lishi-Na.
Gaden-Ko, your family should be laid to rest before we leave.
These people deserve a burial.
I will... send word. Time is short. Pilgrimage will explain this.
We should go.
What could be better?
Sounds thrilling.
You leave first. Call on your device if it is safe. I follow.
If outsider business distracts you, I wait where your ship lands.
The pilgrimage path awaits.
[Gaden-Ko waits for when the path will be safe for him]
A Jedi? My thanks. My family was not enough protection.
All happenings are necessary. Still their deaths... trouble me.
Your family is not lost; they have returned to their source.
They are one with the Force.
Beg pardon, "source"?
Jedi, is now really the time for quasi-philosophical wafflings?
It means your family's alright; they're not suffering anymore.
"Troubling"? How unkind.
If you hadn't rushed out here, I might have prevented this tragedy!
Your impatience is to blame.
This pilgrimage is for Voss; too long delayed.
Understandable. Sometimes Scorekeeper's call is strong.
But, what about your family?
Makes sense. He did it for his people.
These deaths... have a purpose. Pilgrimage would have revealed it.
My journey ends. My family gone, holy grounds defiled. An outsider trespasses.
I came hoping to accompany you on your pilgrimage.
I apologize, but I can help.
I'm here at Sophia Farash's suggestion, to help you finish your training.
I was sent to find you.
Sent by my friend?
If I hadn't "trespassed," you'd be dead. Don't dismiss someone who could help you.
This outsider saved your life.
A Jedi protector. Exceeds a commando's skill.
You are an outsider. Can I trust someone not Voss?
On my honor as a Jedi Master, I swear you can trust me.
Yes. I promise.
I can only be who I am--to trust me is your decision.
That's up to you.
If you want to complete your pilgrimage, you don't have that luxury.
What choice do you have?
You may accompany. When I become Mystic, you shall witness my visions.
If you don't have the gift, what marked you as a potential visionary?
You don't have visions now?
Intuition. Enabling victories against Gormak.
Where do we go?
How "charitable" of you.
Thank you.
Let's get you to the shrine.
We'll go right away.
Matters conspired to keep me away, but I'm ready now
Sorry to have kept you.
Thank you, Jedi.
Hold on a little longer while I prepare.
I'll be right back.
Do not take long.
[Gaden-Ko waits for when the path will be safe for him]
I'm ready to go when you are.
Yes, at once.
If you have everything you need, let us continue.
Are you ready to go?
We have lost time.
Wait here, I have matters to attend to.
Not at the moment.
Very well.
